ps_5_0
dcl_globalFlags refactoringAllowed
dcl_constantbuffer cb0[177], immediateIndexed
dcl_input_ps linear centroid v0.xyz
dcl_output o0.xyzw
dcl_temps 6

// 3DMigoto StereoParams:
dcl_resource_texture2d (float,float,float,float) t125

ld_indexable(texture2d)(float,float,float,float) r2.xyzw, l(0, 0, 0, 0), t125.xyzw


// WATCH_DOGS2 Camera Position adjustment inserted with DarkStarSword's asmtool.py:
// asmtool.py --fix-wd2-unproject --fix-wd2-camera-pos -i --only-autofixed 1b6363a2aa133e57-ps.txt

mul r2.w, r2.x, r2.y
mul r4.x, r2.w, cb0[9].x
mul r4.y, r2.w, cb0[10].x
mul r4.z, r2.w, cb0[11].x
mul r4.w, r2.w, cb0[12].x
dp4 r5.x, r4.xyzw, cb0[17].xyzw
dp4 r5.y, r4.xyzw, cb0[18].xyzw
dp4 r5.z, r4.xyzw, cb0[19].xyzw
add r3.xyz, cb0[174].xyz, r5.xyz

mov r0.xz, l(1.000000,0,1.000000,0)
mov r0.y, cb0[176].w
mul r0.xyz, r0.xyzx, v0.xyzx
mov r1.xz, cb0[176].wwww
mov r1.y, l(0)
mul r0.xyz, r0.xyzx, r1.xyzx
max r0.xyz, r0.xyzx, l(0.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000)
min o0.xyz, r0.xyzx, l(64512.000000, 64512.000000, 64512.000000, 0.000000)
mov o0.w, l(1.000000)
ret
